name: Jonathan
message: Who would've thought there'd be such a long passage under the mansion.　　　　　　　　At this rate, I wouldn't be surprised if tunnels run all under Arkham.

name: Nai
message: It's all thanks to Philip Dunwich's money and power.
Still, that guy couldn't see it through to the end.

name: Jonathan
message: And that's because Sarah got in his way, huh.

name: Nai
message: In the end, it was just a futile struggle.
Our master will wake from his slumber one day.

name: Jonathan
message: A world ruled by chaos and fear, huh‥‥‥‥‥
Humans were only allowed a fleeting existence in our master's dream to begin with.

name: Nai
message: Exactly, there's no one as terrifying as him.
That's more than all of Arkham's villagers.

name: Nai
message: These are the ones who have lingered on for centuries, waiting for this day.　　　　　Not just from Arkham—chosen from every nation, every race.

name: Jonathan
message: So these are all the 'ones who become sustenance'.

name: Nai
message: Indeed, and you stand above all of them.
A pact-bound servant permitted to serve by that person’s side.

name: Jonathan
message: What's going on, a Deep One in the light......

name: Nai
message: Looks like that guy already started the ritual.
You fool, are you still clinging to life?

name: Jonathan
message: There's no way Thomas beat us to it, right？
But, I hope he hasn’t hurt the important sacrifice.

name: Nai
message: It didn't absolutely have to be that woman.
But, we had to raise a girl suited for the role with our own hands.

name: Jonathan
message: So there wasn’t any particular reason you picked Cordelia?
First off, it had to be a girl the pact-bearer—you—liked.

name: Nai
message: Isn't it about time you went？
Before　some　fool　kills　the　girl.

name: Nai
message: Seems there was no need to worry after all.
Getting wrecked like this by a Deep One, huh?
Thomas's right hand and both legs have been torn off with sharp fangs, and he's barely alive.
Looks like he's lost a lot of blood.

name: Nai
message: Idiot, take a good look at your ugly self！
You've got life like a damn bug！

name: Jonathan
message: It's the punishment for being greedy.
It hurts, doesn't it, slowly dying like that？

name: Thomas
message: You... who are you... Are you really Jonathan？

name: Thomas
message: Sure looks like Jonathan on the outside, but inside it's totally...

name: Jonathan
message: Scum... just keep running your damn mouth forever！

name: Nai
message: Guess I'll be taking this back.

name: Thomas
message: Wha... what the hell are you doing...

name: Nai
message: It's something you don't need anymore.
You were destined for this from the start.

name: Jonathan
message: He'll probably die soon enough even if we leave him alone, right？

name: Nai
message: No, you need to awaken as well.

name: Jonathan
message: Am I going to turn into a Deep One too？

name: Nai
message: There's nothing to be afraid of.
The pain will only last for a moment......

name: Jonathan
message: So I just have to kill that guy？

name: Nai
message: Only if you do it in an absolutely gruesome way.
You have been away from this place far too long......

name: Jonathan
message: Don't worry, I'll put you out of your misery real soon.

name: Jonathan
message: That face of yours, twisted in agony......

name: Jonathan
message: I have absolutely no intention of helping you.

name: Jonathan
message: They're steaming, warm vapor rising off them.

name: Jonathan
message: My hands... are soaked in filthy blood.

name: Jonathan
message: With these hands, I killed... that man！

name: Jonathan
message: It was me. I did it.

name: Nai
message: Offer up a sacrifice defiled by your semen, as a covenant bearer.

name: Cordelia
message: Ah, Jonathan... Is this a dream？

name: Nai
message: Enjoy yourself as much as you'd like.

name: Cordelia
message: My chest... it feels like it's going to rip apart！
Why did you end up like this？

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan... Please go back to the way you were...

name: Cordelia
message: Y-your nails... are touching my there！

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, you can do whatever you want.

name: Cordelia
message: Please, just be gentle with me.

name: Cordelia
message: Love me like you always do.

name: Cordelia
message: It's stretching so much, it feels like I'm gonna split！

name: Cordelia
message: It hurts... it really hurts... ahh, Jonathan！

name: Cordelia
message: I can't believe this is happening... me...

name: Cordelia
message: Ahh... so... you do understand my words？

name: Nai
message: My lord... now is finally the time to awaken...

name: Nai
message: All of us humbly devote ourselves to you！

name: Cordelia
message: Nn... I can't take it anymore...

name: Cordelia
message: Why do you look like that...

name: Cordelia
message: But... it doesn't matter what you look like...

name: Cordelia
message: Ahh... stay with me... always be with me！

name: Nai
message: Why... why won't my lord awaken？

name: Nai
message: Even after all these long years...

name: Nai
message: It’s an emergency, come here quick.
《Fool！ Don’t tell me you screwed up？》

name: Nai
message: I can only guess we didn’t have enough sacrifices........
《Ridiculous...... Are you planning to start over again？》

name: Nai
message: Don't worry, there's no need to rush.

name: Nai
message: We can just start again from the beginning.

name: Nai
message: Why are you in such a hurry？

name: Nai
message: All you have to do is wait with the others, embraced by a quiet, warm sea.         Isn’t that right?

name: Nai
message: Looks like I won’t be bored for a while, eh？

name: Nai
message: This time, there shouldn't be any failure.

name: Nai
message: If only I had a little more time until my lord awakens...
